buyerDescriptions.CEO: Leveraging GoInvo's expertise, we designed CDS Connect for AHRQ, a pioneering national repository empowering healthcare providers, developers, and researchers to share and implement clinical decision support tools, fundamentally transforming standards of care. buyerDescriptions.Product Manager: GoInvo's collaboration with AHRQ on the CDS Connect project culminated in the creation of a transformative national repository, aimed at enhancing clinical decision-making and care quality by enabling providers, health IT vendors, and researchers to efficiently share and implement clinical decision support tools. buyerDescriptions.Healthcare Organization: Leverage GoInvo's expertise in creating CDS Connect, a pioneering AHRQ-funded national repository designed for healthcare professionals to exchange and utilize clinical decision support tools, enhancing evidence-based care and patient outcomes. buyerDescriptions.Design Professional: In designing the CDS Connect repository for AHRQ, GoInvo implemented a pioneering approach to solving the fragmentation of clinical decision support tools across the healthcare sector. buyerDescriptions.CEO: By partnering with GoInvo, MITRE Corporation tackled the pressing national challenge of health data interoperability, devising a visionary prototype for the Standard Health Record (SHR) that promises to streamline health data management and potentially save the U.S. healthcare system $80 billion annually.
